main event: A man and his wife observed a round, metallic object hovering in the eastern sky over Montgomery, Alabama on May 8, 1961.
interesting points: The object was approximately 30 to 40 feet in diameter.,The sighting lasted for 2 to 3 minutes.,The weather conditions were scattered clouds with good visibility.,The observation was made while driving home from downtown Montgomery.,The report was received via a telephone call from the observer.
